headline: DNC Chair rips hot mess GOP as the party of fear, fraud, fascism on MSNBC
sentences: Cross added that the GOP is running on a "platform of lies, fear, sexism and racism," and then mused, "You have to wonder, how are millions of voters so eager to turn this country over to the right-wing extremists that now comprise the GOP?"

His latest comments came in response to Cross showing several clips from a variety of Republican campaign ads, which she said was "just a sample of the Republican craziness on the ballot in the upcoming Midterm elections."
"Because I can tell you, most of the time, and this is not you, but some of your colleagues in the media want to report on the Democrats in disarray, rather than the Democrats that are in alignment."
